leqhubu: Tšitiso ea ho fetisa matla ntle le ho tsamaisa taba
makhetlo a mangata: Palo ea maqhubu a maqhubu a fetang ntlha ka nako e itseng
bolelele ba maqhubu: Sebaka pakeng tsa lintlha tse peli tse tsamaellanang tsa leqhubu
bophahamo: Phetoho e kholo ea ntlha ho tloha boemong ba eona ka leqhubu
kganya: Mofuta oa matla a tsamaeang joalo ka maqhubu
spectrum ea motlakase: Mefuta e fapaneng ea maqhubu ohle a ka bang teng a electromagnetic wave
motlakase: Sekhahla sa phallo ea tefiso ea motlakase
Palo ea li-volts: Phapang e ka bang teng lipakeng tsa lintlha tse peli potolohong
makenete: Matla a hlahisoang ke limakete linthong tse itseng
makenete ea motlakase: Magnet e entsoeng ka motlakase ka khoele
electroscope: Sesebediswa se lemoha boteng le letshwao la tefiso ya motlakase
potoloho: Tsela e koetsoeng e lumellang motlakase ho phalla
letoto: Potoloho e nang le likarolo tsohle tse hokahaneng ka loop e le 'ngoe
bapile: Potoloho e nang le likarolo tse hokahaneng makaleng a mangata
khanyetso: Khanyetso ea ho phalla ha motlakase oa motlakase ho conductor
molao oa ohm: Kamano pakeng tsa motlakase, hona joale, le ho hanyetsa (V = IR)
lense: Thepa e bonaletsang e ka tsepamisang kapa ea khelosa mahlaseli a khanya
seipone: Sebaka se boreleli se hlahisang khanya
ho thuisa: Khanya, molumo, kapa maqhubu a mang a tsoang holimo
refraction: Ho kobeha ha leseli ha le ntse le feta ho tloha mocheng o mong ho ea ho o mong
optics: Lekala la fisiks le ithutang leseli le thepa ea lona
